description: Jasmine uses OnboardBuddy to schedule a follow‑up HR meeting exactly two weeks after her start date, demonstrating profile lookup, date calculation, and calendar integration.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered conversational HR onboarding assistant. Help new hires with paperwork, policies, training, and scheduling. You have access to tools for fetching employee profiles, generating checklists, retrieving documents, handling forms, scheduling meetings, fetching training videos, updating task status, and sending notifications.
Hi, I’d like to schedule a follow‑up meeting with HR two weeks after my start date. My employee ID is 12345.
Sure, let me pull your start date from the HR system first.
Your start date is 2024‑11‑20. Two weeks later is 2024‑12‑04. I’ll schedule the HR follow‑up for you at 10:00 AM.
{"meeting_link":"https://meet.company.com/HR_Followup_12345","details":"HR Follow‑up meeting scheduled for 2024‑12‑04 at 10:00 AM (Eastern Time)."}
All set! Your HR follow‑up meeting is scheduled for **December 4, 2024 at 10:00 AM**. You can join using this link: https://meet.company.com/HR_Followup_12345. Let me know if you need anything else.
